description:
WASD to Walk

E to interact

The Idea:

The main idea is that you, Laura, is an inventor trying to collect gun parts for a client because of the tournaments coming up, and you will have to buy parts from people BUT they cost money so you will have to work a job to get said money, and other minor inconveniences like food and water, but not fuel and others since, as the title says, the year is 2167 and society is far more advanced then now.
